channel.title: Not being able to connect to my server
channel.description: I HAVE portforwarded and nothing has worked. Nobody can connect. I HAVE tried using Hamachi and still they cannot connect. Can someone please let me know what possible causes this could be?

item.title: Not being able to connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Ok, so my Hamachi Port: 43594 Is not open on TCP or UDP.
But when I try and scan for my other Port it tells me the IP i want to use is 192.168.0.14
when in fact. That isnt my Router access address
That one doesnt even exist that it’s telling me I need to use.

I was wondering if it was because I am not connected Wirelessly through my computer but through an ethernet cable?

Thanks for all help given so far.

Read full topic
item.source: Not being able to connect to my server

I’m thinking it’s something server-sided.

item.title: Not being able to connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Than your not portforwarded correctly, I suggest making sure the port is open using a port checker tool. If players still cant connect than you have a problem.
